artist: Designer: Wilhelm Wagenfeld; Designer: Karl Jacob Jucker; Manufacturer: Mettalwerkstatt des Staatlichen Bauhauses

description: table lamp; round flat glass base with slight green tint; glass tube shaft with central metal rod; pull chain with ball end; white glass globular shade with metal bottom trim; modern cord (original cord and plug included, D19.4 MS)
